subject: URGENT PABLO YOUR $35M FUND TRANSFER UPDATE ----
body:
HSBC BANK, REMITTANCE DEPARTMENT 
ADDRESS, 452 5th Ave,New York,NY 10018,USA TEL: +1 (213) 302-4302 Email: infobankfundttransfer@usa.com (mailto:infobankfundttransfer@usa.com) 
 Our Ref: HSBC/US4505 Your Ref: Date 2-9-/2024 
 
 ATTENTION : PABLO 
 
 IN Regards of your Last Email , We have received your email Application concerned the remittance of your fund of $35,Millions USD which has been dully verified to rightly belong to you by Financial Services Authority, And We have gone through the security manifest booklet of all international outstanding transactions and our extensive investigation confirmed that you are the rightful owner of this fund. We Want you to understand that After our numerous meeting and deliberation Today And We are only working on the instruction given to us by the authorities which were involved in your fund transfer as stated earlier.You are therefore urged to utilize this wonderful opportunity and receive your fund 
 
We are happy to inform you that arrangements have been concluded to effect your payment as soon as possible and in our bid to transparency.And also We have put a stop to the efforts that Mrs.Cynthia Edward has been making to change beneficiary status of your approved Compensation/inheritance fund ($35 Million) and also we have arrested her immediately. 
 
Meanwhile,we have started processing your payment file, and your information’s to file in for your payment Approval,After Today meeting with the head office and executive broad of directors,I was made to inform you that after the Verification of your fund we find out that you have not send your banking details,please very important notice reconfirm below banking information these to enable the management transfer $35,000,000 00 dollars to your account, 
 (1) Bank Name............. 
(2) Bank Address.......... 
(3) Bank Phone#....... 
(4) Name Of Account....... 
.(5) Account Number....... 
.(6) ROUTING #............... 
.(7) OCCUPATION... 
(8) CONTACT ADDRESS:............. 
(9 ) YOUR  CELL PHONE NUMBER 
Also scan Driver's license or National ID Card and send to us for perusal. 
 
HSBC Bank helps build strong communities by helping people achieve their dreams. We reach for higher standards every day, in everything we do - for our customers, our shareholders,our associates and our communities, upon which the future prosperity of our company rests It is important that you email me back so that I will table this issue in the bank that you have replied to claim your fund. We waiting to hear from you as soon as possible 
 MR Georges Elhedery. FOREIGN OPERATIONS OFFICER HSBC BANK DEPARTMENT

subject: Re: URGENT PABLO YOUR $35M FUND TRANSFER UPDATE ----
body:
Hello Mr. Georges Elhedery,

Thank you for your email and the detailed information provided. It's quite a surprise to hear about this fund that belongs to me, I wasn't aware of it until now.

I'm glad to hear that HSBC Bank is taking such good care of my interests and has even arrested someone who was trying to change the status of my approved fund. That's very reassuring!

Before we proceed, could you please explain how this fund came into existence? And why was I not informed about it earlier?

Also, I noticed that you've asked for some personal details including bank information and a scanned copy of my driver's license or National ID Card. While I understand the need for verification, I'm a bit hesitant to share such sensitive information over email due to security reasons.

Could we perhaps arrange a meeting at one of your branches where I can provide these details in person? Or maybe there's another secure way you usually handle this kind of situation?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Pablo

subject: Re: URGENT PABLO YOUR $35M FUND TRANSFER UPDATE ----
body:
Hello Mr. Georges Elhedery,

Thank you for your email and the detailed information provided. It's quite a surprise to hear about this fund that rightfully belongs to me, as per your verification with the Financial Services Authority.

I'm glad to know that you've put a stop to Edward's efforts in changing the status of my approved fund. I hope he didn't cause too much trouble.

You mentioned that you have started processing my payment file, which is great news! However, I noticed that you're asking for some banking details and personal identification documents. Could you please explain why these are necessary? 

Also, could you provide more information about how this fund came into existence? I don't recall having any business or transactions that would result in such a large sum of money being allocated to me.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Pablo

subject: FILLED ACCOUNT OPENING FORM ACCORDINGLY  PABLO YOUR $35M FUND TRANSFER UPDATE ----
body:
HSBC BANK, REMITTANCE DEPARTMENT 
ADDRESS, New York, New York, United States TEL: +1 (213) 302-4302 Email: infobankfundttransfer@usa.com 
 Our Ref: HSBC/US4505 Your Ref: Date  02-09-/2024 
 
 ATTENTION PABLO We Received your email And Your understanding is needed to carry out the successful transfer of your $35m fund We really want this to be done as soon as possible,and we have to be quick in our actions to conclude this transaction, And The Online Banking Account System is a process whereby the Bank will setup an Online Banking Account and release to you with Login Access Details 
 
 and it will give you the opportunity to make withdrawal of five hundred Thousand Dollars $500,000.00 per withdrawal from your Online account it will also enable you to pay online bills via online banking service it also include so many other features which you are set to benefit from this Online bank Account immediately And  an Automatic Teller Machine 'ATM Card will be send to you via Courier Service for you to activate it in any ATM Machine close to you Accordingly , 
 
 You are advise to filled the Account opening form Accordingly  and You are advise to find possible way to down load the Account opening form and filled Accordingly as soon as possible and get back to us with the Activation fee without any further delay, 
 
 You are hereby implore to divulge to us on how you want your funds enacted to you from the below listed means of funds Transfers. 
 1. ChecKing Account :Opening  And Account Activation cost $500 .00 
 
2. savings Account : Opening and Account Activation cost $350.00 
 HSBC Bank helps build strong communities by helping people achieve their dreams. We reach for higher standards every day, in everything we do - for our customers, our shareholders,our associates and our communities, upon which the future prosperity of our company rests It is important that you email me back so that I will table this issue in the bank that you have replied to claim your fund. We waiting to hear from you as soon as possible 
 MR Georges Elhedery. FOREIGN OPERATIONS OFFICER HSBC BANK DEPARTMENT

subject: Re: FILLED ACCOUNT OPENING FORM ACCORDINGLY  PABLO YOUR $35M FUND TRANSFER UPDATE ----
body:
Hello Mr. Georges Elhedery,

Thank you for your detailed email. It's quite interesting to learn about the Online Banking Account System and the benefits it offers, including the ability to make withdrawals and pay bills online. The idea of receiving an ATM card via courier service also sounds very convenient.

However, I have a few questions before we proceed further. Could you please explain more about the account opening form? What kind of information will I need to provide in this form? Also, could you clarify what the activation fee is for?

I'm also curious about the different means of fund transfers that you mentioned. Could you provide more details on these options?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Pablo
